website_summaries.verdict: This system's fit and features please most users. However, it’s bulky, and installation mistakes are easy to make.
pros: Battery can last up to 5 years due to a simplified engage/disengage feature (rather than a motorized lock)
cons: Battery wiring needs to be tucked securely to prevent pinching
Installation instructions are incomplete and confusing

customer_reviews.title: Door knob falls off!!
customer_reviews.text: Forget about everything else. If after a few turns and twist the door knob falls off, what good is the lock. See the attached video, and you will see what I am talking about. The simple latch mechanism for holding the knobs has been around for a long time. I did not expect the quality of a $100 lock to be so poor that the things are falling off. Update 10/1/2018: I landed up buying the door handle version of the same lock (instead of knobs.)  The handle comes pre-attached and has not fallen off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these (for each of the entrances to my home). I did all the installation and passcode set ups myself and took maybe an hour total to complete all 3. Been using them for about a month now and I love them. So easy to run out with the dogs now or to the mailbox with no worries of being locked out. Also don't worry about forgetting to lock the doors before bedtime. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe with Schlage
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like was the price. I wasn't going to put this on the garage door (I have Schlage regular locks on all my other doors) but I wanted an electronic lock for service providers that come to the house. After reading the reviews of lower price locks, I felt I just didn't want to chance a malfunction in the electronics which is the area most negative reviews focused on. I felt safe with Schlage.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lock
customer_reviews.text: Just as a disclaimer, DO NOT THROW AWAY THE BOX AFTER USE. All of the locks have things such as programming codes that you can punch into the keypad in order to delete a pass code, replace a pass code, and add a pass code. Each lock has its own special unique programming code, so please keep these stored away in case you want a change. But besides this, this is a very nice lock! Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a handle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. You will need to use a jeweler's screwdriver. Electric buttons work easily but do not light up. Nine volt battery is suppose to last 3 years. I'll wait and see. It is solidly built but there is thing missing, that is an optional handle lever instead of the knobs. It is somewhat difficult to twist open the door with such a large housing for the buttons. I'm afraid I'll bang up my knuckles one day.
customer_reviews.author: Advid

customer_reviews.title: Lock is great, installation instructions could be a bit better
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions could have been a little more detailed, but they’re good enough. Complaints about the length of the interior and exterior knobs are legit, but pay attention to which is which coming out of the box or just look modestly carefully at each one and you’ll see the difference in length. More detail on their idea of tucking the wires so they’re not pinched by the cover, and the spring catches on each knob would have been useful, but also pretty much only one way it’s going to work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Martin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, functional, easy to install, keypad numbers a touch small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an exterior door. Attractive, functional, easy to install. The auto-lock feature is useful. The keypad lights up at night, which is important. I have average size hands and fingers and yet find the keypad numbers a touch small, and close together. Programming is somewhat complex - had to read the instructions twice to get it to work. Maybe I have average intelligence too.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and quality
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. Install was a little tricky with the route of wires, but other than that easy. Make sure you put the knobs on the correct sides. Amazon has pictures showing short and long knob proper placement. I have had zero issues. Wish they had a slender unit for my front door as it will not fit between storm door and regular door. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews by Dee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a regular, plain old closet door knob so that we can store things out of sight and reach from our 10 year old son, and it's a very solid, easy to install replacement. So without any problems or rearrangement of holes in the door or jamb, we were able to go from an insecure walk-in closet to a much more secure walk-in closet to keep our guns and documents in. I'm not mechanically inclined at all, but I had this installed within a half an hour. It would have been quicker if the instructions were written a whole lot bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Krabby Dave

customer_reviews.title: Flex Lock is the best lock imho
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was missing pieces, but I bought it used. This is the 3rd Schlage keyless punch button lock I’ve bought. Now on every entry door to my home. I highly highly recommend the flex lock. Auto locks when you pull the door shut behind you.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are important
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to put the long barrel handle on the digit pad side of the lock. The instruction sheet must be read and understood before assembly or you may face assembly confusion. Note that the non lever style handle will possibly reference the lever style handle in the assembly instructions. Overall an easy handy person assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Cousineau

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy installation. I really do not understand why some people had problems installing. One thing I do understand: if you have the round knob, put the longer one on the outside, with the keypad. The instructions really should say that. Overall, I am very pleased with the quality, look, and function. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Kids don't have to worry about losing their keys!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best upgrades I've ever done. It's such a relief knowing my kids can't lose their house key and can get inside even if I get stuck at work and can't make it home before the school bus. I've had it about a year now and wish I would have bought it 5 years ago. It fit right in where the old doorknob was and looks great. Instructions were easy to follow for anyone familiar with basic home maintenance and repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed, clear directions on how to set up, and has been in constant daily use for five months now. It was installed in less than an hour, which included removing the previous knob set, and as long as you follow the directions, it will be a breeze. Setting up our personal code was simple as well, again, just follow the directions. But, keep those directions handy in case you ever want to change the code! I love the top button that illuminates the numbers at night ... press it and then all the numbers light up.
customer_reviews.author: JennL

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money. And if you have kids... no lost keys!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for a couple of years now. Works great. Heavy use and still have same battery. Only con I would put here is it needs to be tightened once in awhile = it'll slide a little on the door. But that's minor. Pro's: No lost keys! I have 5 kids. I can have several codes and change them very easily. Never forget to lock the door because it's always locked unless you want to disable that feature, during time of company for example.
customer_reviews.author: JRF

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a key!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my storage room in the basement. You know...the room where you put everything and you don't want anyone to see all the stuff you've accumulated. I had a key lock on the door before this and then lost the key. Had my son install this lock and oh my gosh...I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great setup
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and installed on my office/gun room door almost 2 years ago. Looks great, and has worked flawlessly since day one. No complaints and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the color is a little off.
customer_reviews.text: This was great, however was the wrong color once I went to install it. I like it because you can turn on and off the autolock, which is great for when i am bringing in groceries and I don't want to leave the door open but I don't have the hands to punch in the key, same thing for getting the mail. Other then that it is follow the directions and installation if fairly simple like most Schlage. I ended up getting the rubbed bronze version with the manual locking lock.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love going out for a run and not taking a key. The illuminated key pad is great at night too. Looks good, works good and was fairly easy to install if you have ever put a normal lockset in. One thing that threw me was that the two knobs which look the same are a little different lengths so it DOES matter which in on the inside and outside. The longer one will fit on either side but the shorter only on one. I can't remember which is which now but I thought there was a big problem until I switched them around. Then they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kiliman

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My only problem was that instructions were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My only problem was that instructions were for the non-knob handle version, and I could not find any documentation online, and I could not get the outer knob to lock in place due to the inner wavy washer taking up space. I removed the extra washer and everything locked into place. Works like a champ for the kids when they forget their keys. Multiple codes can be set.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Huge quality of life upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. No longer have to find the key to go out to my building where my tools,4 wheeler and lawn equipment is stored. Just type the number in the keypad and then shut the door when I'm done and it auto locks.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my basement room where I like to keep my Christmas presents! Keeps the kids out! And works like a charm! Installed quickly and easily!! I love how it locks behind you in case you don’t remember to lock it! So good I purchased another one!
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to re-key, solid Schlage quality. No frills, not Internet connected, and so not hackable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is just so easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I will never be able to have a regular key entry again. This is just so easy and convenient. Especially with kids who lose everything, there is no worries now! Extremely easy to install. So easy, in fact, that I over thought it and made it much harder than it was! Will be ordering another for our front door. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Salako

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great brand!!!! We have 2. Read the reviews about install, and the advice. Some people have struggled with install.
customer_reviews.author: Shaney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lock .You get what you pay for .
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of them, easy to install and program.. great company. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: GOOD LUCK SERVICE STATION INC

customer_reviews.title: Great lock set but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, beautifully finished, and has a precision sound and feel to its operation. The only glitch during assy was not being able to install the cylindrical trim piece behind the knob. The locking tab that secures it would not depress and allow the trim to slide over it, so I just left it off. No one will ever notice, but it could have been designed better. Functionally and aesthetically, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Nickel

customer_reviews.title: It was sleeve like piece that goes on the door knob before you ...
customer_reviews.text: It was ok, there was piece that we ended up not using on the outside door knob or the knob would fall off. It was sleeve like piece that goes on the door knob before you put the actual knob on. Strange and a little concerned it will malfunction later on, but I've had it for over a month and it works fine. Comes with the battery, so that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for those forgetting keys all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of an aging parent who has Alzheimer's was forgetting and losing keys to the house. For some odd reason she remembers set of numbers she used at work so I programmed those numbers into the keypad so now she's good to come and go as she pleases with no need of keys. Eventually I will replace this with a biometric lock but this is a less expensive route at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worse lock ever
customer_reviews.text: The worse lock ever... the lock isn't meant for a home its more of an office or a suite. the lock isn't strong enough to withhold pressure. it can break very easily... the bolts and screws were made of brass... not steel so the material was very bad... returning this item
customer_reviews.author: N. R

customer_reviews.title: works great. similar style as my existing Schlage doorknobs
customer_reviews.text: Using on an interior closet, works great. similar style as my existing Schlage doorknobs. Was easy to install, used the keycode that came with it. Package says 9 volt battery needs changed every year which will require some disassembly, that reason for only 4 stars. They should be able to design so battery can be changed from non-combination side by sliding a cover off.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella S

customer_reviews.title: Great working action; easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.text: A great door knob that works smoothly and is easy to use. A fabulous security device and the color matches our 1980's bronze hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I had the same previously but with the lever rather then the knob, but ordered this one because my dog would open the lever from the inside (brat). I had it for about 6 months and used it daily and still didn't need to change the battery. This new one works just as well. It is so much easier than fumbling for keys and is very easy to install and program.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this lock. We also like the feature for turning off the electricity so the lock will NOT lock behind you when you close the door. For those people looking for a "Shabbos" feature, this works great. We also have a dead bolt to lock the house if we are on the inside, when we have the other turned off.
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I am so loving this lock system. I do not have a dead bolt door so this works perfect. Easy for everyone to use, mother to neighbors. I like the option to have the door unlocked all the time too if I wish. Light up keypad is helpful. We use this for a side door.
customer_reviews.author: Meows2002

customer_reviews.title: super easy to program!
customer_reviews.text: the only trouble I had installing was to fit the wires in the hold-backs to prevent crunching them. super easy to program and delete codes, using for a cabin rental, so far so good update: have been using it for 3 months+ with no issues, renters love it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: We like the knob
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback is that we still haven't gotten the outside knob to set properly on the lock. We have talked to Schlage and they told us it is harder to fit the knobs. They are not inter-exchangable with the handles so that is not a solution. We like the knob. It just doesn't snap into place so we have to remember not to pull too hard when we are shutting the door.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn C. Kostrub

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock has made our life sooooooooooo much easier. Not having to worry about locking the door (it's always locked) or losing a key, provides real peace of mind. Our 14 year old daughter, who regularly forgot or lost her key, now does not have to wait outside. Installation was a breeze, probably about 15 minutes (and I'm not a locksmith or anything like that). The instructions could have been a little more clear, but overall, it was simple, and quick. I'd recommend this lock to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Ed B long island

customer_reviews.title: it’s worth your money
customer_reviews.text: i like this door lock, easy to install and works well
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Deveza

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lock
customer_reviews.text: Great quality lock. You can feel it is much heavier and studier than the cheaper locks. Only wish it wasn't so expensive, and had more features. like passcodes that were longer than 4 digits..
customer_reviews.author: jimimimimi

customer_reviews.title: Great lock easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Was easy to install hardest part was getting the battery wires in the right place. I watched several youtube videos before and during the install and programming which was a big help. Love not needing my keys to get in. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: it's good and they work well
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a number of these. To me, this color is a bit strange and I'd probably suggest you give some thought to the tone that works for you (silver is better). Otherwise, it's good and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gitter

customer_reviews.title: Installation and use is easy!
customer_reviews.text: Installation is no harder than installing a regular door knob. Works great! No longer have to worry about getting locked out, as long as I remember the codes!
customer_reviews.author: David Houck

customer_reviews.title: I got these on pretty much every door in my house.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and the battery lasts for more than 2 years. The only problem I have is that the deadbolt is pretty loud when the door shuts closed. The spring is too strong or something. I wish someone could tell me how to dampen the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I like the auto lock feature that locks it after entry but you can easily turn this feature off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J

customer_reviews.title: Great Lockset for indoors
customer_reviews.text: Used this lockset for years on my bedroom. Never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well little hard to install
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these plan on buying more
customer_reviews.author: SCUBA GLENN

customer_reviews.title: Buy this you'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: I forget keys....a lot. I use this on my back door. Remember locks keep honest people honest. If someone wants to burglarize you theyre going to break something. Easy install and program. It holds up to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: easy install and not bad looking
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy install and not bad looking, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert H Brown

customer_reviews.title: Knob on the keypad side does not attach well
customer_reviews.text: The knob slides off while pulling it to close door. Replaced with Schlage FE595 V PLY 609 FLA Plymouth Keypad Entry and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Far better than key locks
customer_reviews.text: Installation wasn't fun, but when i finally got it installed, all the frustration was worth it! Works perfectly and so much better that a key lock. Keep the instructions because you will beed them to change the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bob

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I use it for an exterior door. Installs easily. Looks great. Works perfectly. Easy to program. I have 5 different people that each have their own code to get in. You can get in with a key as well, in case the codes quit working for some reason. If you are having a party or something where you want to allow people to go in and out at will, you just flip the mechanism on the inside and it will operate like any other unlocked door.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Gronsky

customer_reviews.title: Great for land lords
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and program. I own 60 some rental properties and I put this in all my properties. The upfront cost is a bit more but when someone moves out I just reprogram the code for the next tenant and not change of locks. I also don't have to deal with lost keys or 2am calls to go unlock a place.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Grass Group, LLC.

customer_reviews.title: Installed perfectly on standard door, replacing an old indoor ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed perfectly on standard door, replacing an old indoor lock. Programs and works perfectly. Instruction manual is a little confusing. Would give 5 stars if the Flex-Lock switch when put into the unlock position can be locked from outside by pushing the Schlage key.
customer_reviews.author: waeshop

customer_reviews.title: Great entry
customer_reviews.text: Great Entry for our yoga studio. Easy and so far reliable. Being used at least 3x day. for the past 3 months
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to go wrong with a Schlage door knob
customer_reviews.text: I have added several different Schlage keypad door knobs over time. This like the others was easy to install and has a quality feel.
customer_reviews.author: ToddP

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple user doors / buildings.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for our little League storage shed. What a time saver, no more making keys for coaches every year. When the season is over, we will simply clear out the code. Hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Pete B

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and to set different codes for different folks. Also easy to undo a code when no longer needed. I don't need a key for my car and now I don't need a key for my house!
customer_reviews.author: Suwink

customer_reviews.title: I really love this keypad lock
customer_reviews.text: I really love this keypad lock. It is so handy to not have to get out your keys when coming into the house from the garage. It looks nice and works great. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for cold weather and durable
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the deadbolts these guys do. (I installed many of these as an assistant locksmith) but I am overall happy thus far.
customer_reviews.author: PM701

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic lock.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic lock. The battery lasts forever, and it's the only brand that has a secure numerical lock. They key works too, though I don't use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: The Happy Chef :)

customer_reviews.title: Love these locks.
customer_reviews.text: Love these babies. My only qualm is that the outside door handle mechanism is a little stiff, and when i turn the door-knob, it doesn't spring back to the center position properly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As easy to install as a regular door lock, programming is simple and no more fumbling for keys which is always a plus! Works great, don't know about battery life as I just installed it a week ago but I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Electronic Technician

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great choice! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, use and program. Quiet buttons and mechanism. Sturdy and reliable. Great looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Easy to install and works very well. Easy to program the code in and the key backup is nice. Looks nice. The back light makes it easy to see the keys in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great for workshop
customer_reviews.text: This handle has an auto lock mode where you use code to open and when you leave you close the door and the door is auto relocked. Very handy for garage or workshop. I have the deadbolt door lock for some other doors but this all in one (lock and handle in one piece) is very nice. Well worth the price. One advantage to these locks is you can re-program the code (four numbers). If you have visitors and you want to reset the lock once the leave to ensure belongings are secure, it is very easy. No need to have lock re-keyed just re-program it. Link for deadbolt lock:
customer_reviews.author: WWCO

customer_reviews.title: I recommend using a 9volt lithium battery to avoid having to ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed and in use for 2 months. No problems yet. I recommend using a 9volt lithium battery to avoid having to change often.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much that I'm adding a second unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Hells, yes! I love it so much that I'm adding a second unit to my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Cogan

customer_reviews.title: Quality keypad door opener.
customer_reviews.text: This is quality. It was easy to install although the directions weren't real clear on some things. Works flawlessly. The lighted keypad is great at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jlann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!  Excellent product and makes life soooooo easy - No more keys!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Excellent product and makes life soooooo easy - No more keys!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KarK

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation - Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation! We love not having to use a key. Seems to be good quality so far.....
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and love the fact that my kids can now enter without having a key. It was easy to install and to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Kids won't loose the key!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my exterior door a few weeks ago and so far it is working great Don't have to worry about the kids being locked out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: still working strong after prolonged outdoor exposed use in new england
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and exactly as advertised. I put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and exactly as advertised. I put it on my shed so I don't have to worry about keys anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald D. Zuber II

customer_reviews.title: Schlage FE595 Cam609 GEO Camelot keypad Entry door lock
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and operate. Functions as supposed to. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Fooky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, why didn't we buy this years ago. No more hiding keys outside for the kids when they forget theirs during the school day. They can just let themselves in. Easy to install and looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Absher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get installed. I just needed one with handle instead of knob. Hand easier to open with hands full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made. sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lock which allows providing individual codes to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Winter

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the user loves it. They have had no problems with it and it is easy to change the combo.
customer_reviews.author: cokeskeller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy for what I needed...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and Installed without any issues. Pretty easy. Took 30 minutes. Appears very solid. Entering codes is a breeze. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TravisF

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Replaced traditional deadbolt door lock with this, should have done it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works good. so far no problems work just like they ...
customer_reviews.text: works good.so far no problems work just like they say it does.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Been installed couple months, LOVE IT. Easy to install, so easy to use, no more hunting for keys.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and met expectations. It would have been better appearance with door handle than the knob.
customer_reviews.author: Venkata R. Vietla

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was a great buy. It was easy to installed and they worked great and now everyone has their own code to enter.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Mata

customer_reviews.title: Quality Household Lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lock. No need for a key ever again. Easy to change codes. Control who enters your home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. Imstilation instruction easy to follow. I like no ley entry.
customer_reviews.author: charles davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock
customer_reviews.text: this lock is fantastic. No more forgetting my keys and having to ask the neighbor to let me into my house!!
customer_reviews.author: parman

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy installation. Installed it on a garage door that I had never kept locked. Was not sure I would like unlocking all the time as it self locks but really like it, better than expected
customer_reviews.author: mary johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, good quality, however easy to pick with a credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Chefwozz

customer_reviews.title: Great product (auto-lock is particularly nice)!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother and it seems to be a really nice item. It feels pretty solid and was easy to install. One of the reasons we wanted the keypad entry was because it eliminates the need for my niece and nephew (i.e. her grandchildren) to carry a key with them...on that note, probably the best feature about this particular keypad unit is the way the auto-lock setting was designed and it is particularly useful because sometimes the kids forget to re-lock the door when leaving and it locks itself seconds later thus keeping the residence secure. I would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Monkee54

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of them and it's such a please to not have to search for a key
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of this lock. Liked it so much I bought a second for another door.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to install. I use a separate code for temporary access which is easily changed. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: 22Maddog

customer_reviews.title: Review of Schlage FE595 CAM 609 GEO Camelot Keypad Entry with Flex-Lock and Georgian... Schlage
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong, well made lock set. The quallity is great for the price and it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is so very easy to use, very convenient iin all its features, easy to understand the iinstructions. No problem at all replacing my old knobs with these. Price is very reasonable, too. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: c.g. crump

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install works great. Nice not having to keep a key with you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy install... Took me 15 minutes with zero experience. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Ricardo Ghilardi
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product very easy to install very safe,look's very nice and I recommend for every one !
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

product_meta.title: Schlage FE595 CAM 609 GEO Camelot Keypad Entry with Flex-Lock and Georgian Style Knobs, Antique Brass
product_meta.description:
No more keys to hide, lose, carry or forget. Keypad knobs offer keyless access and provide maximum security protection to make your life more convenient. Install and program in minutes with no Wiring required.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Experience keyless freedom with Schlage keypad entry locks. Flex-Lock feature allows you to switch between unlocked or automatic re-locking with the turn of a button. No keys to hide, lose, carry, or forget. Brings a new level of security, convenience, and quality to your home. Ready to install right out of the box; one tool. One person. Under 30 minutes. 9-volt battery included, three year battery life with low battery visual and audible warning. Easy to add and delete codes. Enter up to 19 different four-digit codes right at the keypad using the unique six-digit code you create. Lighted keypad makes entering easy at night. All metal escutcheons. Features free-spinning keyway to prevent wrench attacks, but easy to turn when correct code is entered. Patented key override feature with 2 keys included. Solid brass escutcheons, meets ANSI Grade 2 requirements. Preset with one unique 6-digit programming code and 2 unique 4-digit user codes. Comes with the Schlage 5 pin C keyway.
feature_bullets: For back, side or garage entries; also ideal for offices, workout rooms, wine cellars or any room requiring access control
Professional Grade security with the biggest adjustable bolt available for increased resistance to kick ins

Limited lifetime finish and mechanical warranty; Back set ; Universal latches and deadbolts fit 2 3/8 (60 millimeter) or 2 3/4 (70 millimeter) back set.Keying: 5-pin tumbler C keyway with one nickel silver key
Pre set, unique, 6 digit programming code, 2 pre set unique 4 digit user codes (19 code capacity); Coordinate with other camelot Antique Brass products
Door thickness range: 1 3/8 inches to 1 3/4 inches thick
No programming required; this Camelot style keypad with Georgian knob comes preset with 2 user codes so it's ready to use right out of the box
Keyless entry for enhanced security, no keys to lose or forget
Flex-Lock feature allows you to switch between unlocked or automatic re-locking with the turn of a button
Keypad illuminates so you can see it at night
Codes easily added or deleted right at the keypad using the lock's unique 6 digit programming code
Includes 9-volt battery, a 6 digit programming code, and two 4 digit user codes pre-set at the factory

specifications.Warranty Description: Lifetime mechanical and finish, one year electronic
